s.text: J) "The Slow Week": Nash and Joe keep waiting for the phone to ring, but it doesn't.
293, "Sporting Life," said that Montreal's Olympic Stadium was filled with people watching a bloodless rodeo last weekend.

But, let's face it, a disproportionate number of visitors just want to see Archie Bunker's chair.
Seems to me that an equitable compromise would be to have the foie gras crammed down the Smithsonian visitors' throats, but nobody asked me.
